meanings.definition: A type of poem consisting of six stanzas of six lines each, followed by a three-line stanza.
meanings.sent1: In her English class, she learned about sestinas and their unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The poet spent hours crafting a sestinas filled with intricate wordplay.
meanings.sent3: The sestinas at the poetry slam left everyone in awe of the poets' creativity.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sestinas, each thought carefully woven into the lines.
meanings.sent5: The sestinas painted vivid images with words, captivating the audience.
